muxconfig.Customise your muOS setup with user crea: 使用用户创建的配置文件调整本机设置

muxconnect.Connect to a Wi-Fi network manually or v: 手动连接Wi-Fi网络或者使用保存的Wi-Fi设定

muxcustom.Allows for testing different theme resol: Allows for testing different theme resolutions
muxcustom.Change how the font type works in the fr: 切换使用字体的跟随来源。“主题”：优先使用跟随主题包提供的字体，其次使用语言包提供的字体；“语言”：优先使用语言包提供的字体
muxcustom.Change the display priority of the conte: 切换游玩内容封面的优先级
muxcustom.Change the screen alignment of the conte: 调整游玩内容封面在显示画面对齐位置
muxcustom.Load user created RetroArch configuratio: 加载用户创建的RA模拟器配置文件
muxcustom.Load user created artwork catalogue for: 载入用户为内容列表制作的封面集
muxcustom.Load user created boot logos for your de: Load user created boot logos for your device
muxcustom.Toggle the background music of the front: Toggle the background music of the frontend
muxcustom.Toggle the fade to black animation on co: 设置淡出到黑屏效果开关
muxcustom.Toggle the navigation sound of the front: Toggle the navigation sound of the frontend
muxcustom.Toggle the splash image on content launc: 设置启动内容画面开关
muxcustom.Toggle the startup chime of the frontend: Toggle the startup chime of the frontend

muxdanger.Amount of data preloaded in memory befor:
Amount of data preloaded in memory before it's requested

Larger values improve sequential read performance
muxdanger.Automatically adjusts scheduler behaviou:
Automatically adjusts scheduler behaviour based on CPU count

Disable for consistent tuning on devices
muxdanger.Background write back starts when dirty:
Background write back starts when dirty data exceeds this percentage of RAM

Lower values help reduce latency
muxdanger.Controls how aggressively the system swa:
Controls how aggressively the system swaps memory to disk

Lower values keep processes in RAM longer
muxdanger.Controls how kernel merges I/O requests\:
Controls how kernel merges I/O requests

Disabling merges may benefit specific flash storage performance
muxdanger.Enables or disables tracking of per-devi:
Enables or disables tracking of per-device I/O statistics

Disabling may improve performance slightly
muxdanger.Flushes dirty data on idle instead of us:
Flushes dirty data on idle instead of using write back thresholds

Useful for flash storage or reducing idle power
muxdanger.Higher values reclaim cached file data m:
Higher values reclaim cached file data more aggressively

Lower values improve performance for repeated file access
muxdanger.How long real-time tasks run before swit:
How long real-time tasks run before switching

Lower values favour responsiveness, higher values favour throughput
muxdanger.Number of pages read ahead when swapping:
Number of pages read ahead when swapping

Lower values = less latency, higher = more efficient bulk reads
muxdanger.Percentage of RAM allowed to hold unwrit: Percentage of RAM allowed to hold unwritten (dirty) data before forcing a write to disk
muxdanger.Sets the maximum number of queued I/O re:
Sets the maximum number of queued I/O requests per device

Higher values increase throughput but use more RAM
muxdanger.When enabled, a newly forked child proce:
When enabled, a newly forked child process runs before the parent

May improve load times for some apps

muxgov.Configure CPU governors to dynamically a: 设置CPU调度方案，以动态调整CPU频率并针对能耗和性能优化

muxhdmi.Select the resolution for HDMI output, s: 选择HDMI输出分辨率，比如720p或1080p
muxhdmi.Set the color depth, such as 8-bit or 10: 选择HDMI输出色深为8位或10位
muxhdmi.Switch between overscan or underscan to: 选择HDMI输出过/欠扫描以对齐画面

muxinfo.View all of the current muOS supporters: View all of the current muOS supporters and extra credits

muxlaunch.Various applications can be found and la: 查看并启动各种应用程序

muxtester.Press any button to start input testing!: 按下任意按键开始测试输入!

muxtweakadv.Adjust the rate of speed when holding na: 调整按住导航按键时菜单滚动速度
muxtweakadv.Adjust the system swapfile if required b: 按部分运行要求分配虚拟内存
muxtweakadv.Adjust the system zram if required by ce: Adjust the system zram if required by certain content
muxtweakadv.Change how the device buttons work globa: 切换系统按键操作特征
muxtweakadv.Change the default audio level that the: 设置开机时的默认音量大小
muxtweakadv.Change the default brightness level that: 设置开机时的默认亮度
muxtweakadv.Change the default theme used for the ne: 设置是否下次开机时更换默认主题
muxtweakadv.Change the displayed battery percentage: 设置电池容量计数偏移值以满足对电池容量的准确计数
muxtweakadv.Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch unti: 设置是否在确认联网前暂缓RetroArch启动
muxtweakadv.Toggle startup and shutdown verbose mess: 设置开关机时是否输出日志消息
muxtweakadv.Toggle the functionality of the power bu: 设置是否开启电源按键切换十字键功能

muxtweakadv.Toggle the system ability to automatical: 设置是否过热时自动关机

muxtweakgen.Change the brightness of the device to a: 调整显示亮度为具体值
muxtweakgen.Change the colour temperature of the dis: 设置显示色温（需设备支持）
muxtweakgen.Change the volume of the device to a spe: 调整本机音量至一个特定级别
muxtweakgen.Change where the device will start up in: 设置开机进入的默认界面

muxvisual.Changes the top title label in Explore C: 设置内容浏览器顶栏是否在文件夹名后显示正在查看的存储设备
muxvisual.Changes the transparency of the overlay: Changes the transparency of the overlay image for the frontend only
muxvisual.Display Title Reformatting: 显示标题格式调整（英文）
muxvisual.Rearranges the label of content to move: （英文语境）将文件名的“..., The”格式调整为“The ...”格式
muxvisual.Remove extra information from content la: 删除内容名包含的标记信息 - 仅更改内容列表里显示的内容名，文件名不更改
muxvisual.Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) f: 将内容名里的连接号（-）更换为冒号（:）
muxvisual.Replaces the label of shortened content: 将使用字母简称的内容目录名更换为其对应的平台全名
muxvisual.Switch between different overlay styles: Switch between different overlay styles for the frontend only
muxvisual.Toggle hidden content displayed in Explo: 设置是否显示隐藏的内容文件（隐藏文件名或文件夹名以“.”或“_”开头的项目）
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of currently selec: 设置内容浏览器是否在查看文件夹时，显示子文件夹序号和总数
设置内容浏览器是否在查看文件夹时，显示文件序号和总数
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of empty folders i: 设置检索内容时是否显示空文件夹
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the item count: 设置内容浏览器是否在文件夹名称后显示该文件夹内的项目数量

muxwebserv.Toggle SFTP support - WebUI can be found: 设置SFTP支持 - 通过端口9090连接
muxwebserv.Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22: 设置SSH支持 - 通过端口22连接
muxwebserv.Toggle Syncthing - WebUI can be found on: 设置Syncthing同步 - 通过端口7070进入WebUI界面
muxwebserv.Toggle Tailscale - Need to login via SSH: 开关Tailscale（需要先通过SSH登录来配置）
muxwebserv.Toggle network time protocol for active: 对于激活的网络链接设置网络时间协议支持
muxwebserv.Toggle virtual terminal - WebUI can be f: 设置虚拟终端 - 通过端口8080进入WebUI界面
